stimulusHtml: A merry-go-round on a playground consists of a large, horizontal disk that can rotate about a vertical axis through its center. The disk is initially at rest and is given an angular acceleration α that varies with time t according to the equation α=Ct-D, where C and D are positive constants with appropriate units and the positive direction is taken to be clockwise. Which of the following statements is true about the angular velocity of the merry-go-round at time t=DC ?
choicesHtml: It is at its maximum magnitude and in the counterclockwise direction.
It is at its maximum magnitude and in the clockwise direction.
